prompt.content: How did Expand Energy Corporation's quarterly Capex figures (excluding the productive capacity program) compare to management guidance (at midpoint) for the last 3 quarters. Use guidance from the previous quarter's management guidance when comparing and format answer as % Beat or % Miss with a beat representing actual capex being lower and vice-versa for a miss. Round percentage to 2 decimal places.

rubrics.name: Used correct formula for beat/miss: (Actual Figure/Guided Figure)-1, expressed as a percentage rounded to 2 decimal places

messages.content: Used correct formula for beat/miss: (Actual Figure/Guided Figure)-1, expressed as a percentage rounded to 2 decimal places

rubrics.name: Used correct formula for guidance midpoint: (upper bound of guidance + lower bound of guidance)/2

messages.content: Used correct formula for guidance midpoint: (upper bound of guidance + lower bound of guidance)/2
